## Pre-PR Checklist

- [ ] I added logging as needed
- [ ] I added/updated documentation as needed
- [ ] I didn't add any new TODO items
- [ ] I reviewed the diff line by line

## Post-Approval Checklist

- [ ] I merged my changes into `main`
- [ ] I updated any required database tables and entries
- [ ] I deleted my branch
